history.content:
Have interests in computational/synthetic biology, protein modeling and design, and/or machine learning? iGEM at Berkeley is looking for new students to join their project teams for the Spring 2022 semester and beyond! Don’t miss an opportunity to work on exciting student-led research in protein design and attain research units to boot! 


Applications are now open here, and are due Wednesday 1/26 at 11:59pm. Feel free to reach out to us for more information by email or Slack (get access by contacting directors@igem.berkeley.edu)!
history.subject: iGEM at Berkeley - Computational Biology Projects Open to Applicants!
